title: News24.com | This El Nino among the strongest since 1950
text: Too Many Cholesterol Meds for Elderly Patients? A new study found that statin use in patients age 80 or older without heart disease has increased significantly since 1999. Statins (brand names Lipitor, Crestor, Zocor, among others) are drugs used to lower cholesterol. The rate of statin use in very elderly patients without heart disease rose... Recent related news Ocean and atmospheric conditions along with expert models and opinion point to a strengthening of the El Nino in the second half of 2015.
